DOC.criteria: Patients undergo noncardiac surgery ≥ 45 year age ; either sex . Have expect length stay ≥ 24 hour Fulfill one follow 6 criterion : coronary artery disease ; peripheral vascular disease ; history stroke due atherothrombotic disease ; hospitalization congestive heart failure within 3 year randomization ; undergo major vascular surgery ; OR 3 follow 7 criterion : schedule high risk surgery ( i.e . intraperitoneal intrathoracic ) ; emergency/urgent surgery ; history congestive heart failure ; history transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) ; diabetes currently oral hypoglycemic agent insulin therapy ; preoperative serum creatinine > 175 µmol/L ( > 2.0 mg/dl ) ; age > 70 year . Contraindication metoprolol include follow : significant bradycardia ( heart rate < 50 beat per minute ) ; second third degree heart block without pacemaker ; asthma active within last decade ; history chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) bronchospasm pulmonary function test .
